headers.access-control-expose-headers: ETag, Link, Location, Retry-After, X-GitHub-OTP, X-RateLimit-Limit, X-RateLimit-Remaining, X-RateLimit-Used, X-RateLimit-Resource, X-RateLimit-Reset, X-OAuth-Scopes, X-Accepted-OAuth-Scopes, X-Poll-Interval, X-GitHub-Media-Type, X-GitHub-SSO, X-GitHub-Request-Id, Deprecation, Sunset

issueOrPullRequest.body:
This pull request updates this Python SDK to align with the latest feature set of TS SDK:

- add mapping-based audio format parsing and turn-detection normalization coverage for websocket model config
- test realtime handoff enablement filtering and SIP payload construction helpers
- ensure _get_session_config handles audio block overrides without extra casts
- update llms*.txt to make them more accurate
issueOrPullRequest.title: Add realtime audio mapping support and SIP session payload tests
